feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 07:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -34.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
